Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self)
if tonumber(GAMESTATE:GetVersionDate()) >= 20170714 then --start,end,name,difficulty,color local mbc3_spellcards = { {0,44,'Trial by Fire',6,{219/256,0,0,1}}, {44,76,'Welcome to Yin Bao\'s Palace',6,{152/256,42/256,74/256,1}}, {76,140,'Magic Palace -Endless Corridors-',7,{77/256,77/256,145/256,1}}, {140,172,'Magic Palace -Cognitive Corruption-',8,{0,111/256,213/256,1}}, {172,204,'Roomentary Respite',5,{72/256,76/256,144/256,1}}, {204,268,'Magic Palace -Shifting Corridors-',7,{149/256,34/256,63/256,1}}, {268,296,'Escapism',6,{219/256,0,0,1}},
{300,326,'Cubing the Sphere',7,{0,168/256,255/256,1}}, {326,358,'Throne Room -Hall of Despair-',8,{30/256,190/256,223/256,1}}, {358,382,'Throne Room -Infinity Oversoul-',9,{63/256,214/256,188/256,1}}, {382,418,'Fine Art -Poetic Feeling of Yin Bao-',6,{98/256,240/256,151/256,1}}, {418,456,'Great Wealth -Inverted Palace-',8,{119/256,255/256,128/256,1}}, {456,504,'Oriental Star',7,{78/256,224/256,172/256,1}}, {504,544,'Great Wealth -Dragon Twist-',8,{42/256,197/256,210/256,1}}, {544,583,'Aqueduct',7,{9/256,171/256,245/256,1}},
{584,652,'Catacombs -Arcaic Waterway-',6,{1,1,0,1}}, {652,684,'Beholder -Seeing Eye-',6,{243/256,163/256,0,1}}, {684,716,'Beholder -Rolling Eye-',7,{249/256,82/256,0,1}}, {716,787,'Fate determined by coin toss',7,{1,0,0,1}}, {787,844,'Great Magic -Oriental Dragonfly-',6,{249/256,82/256,0,1}}, {844,876,'Great Magic -Devil\'s Recitation-',7,{243/256,163/256,0,1}}, {876,908,'Catacombs -Waterfall-',7,{1,1,0,1}},
{923,953,'This Part Slaps',5,{154/256,0,248/256,1}}, {953,967,'PFCMeme2',2,{111/256,0,179/256,1}}, {967,1001,'Grand Finale -Black Emperor-',7,{52/256,0,85/256,1}}, {1001,1084,'Desperation -Black Hole-',7,{0,0,0,1}}, }
local s = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong()
--send spellcards if table.getn(mbc3_spellcards) ~= 0 then
s:SetNumSpellCards(table.getn(mbc3_spellcards)) for i=1,table.getn(mbc3_spellcards) do local a = mbc3_spellcards[i] s:SetSpellCardTiming(i-1,a[1],a[2]) s:SetSpellCardName(i-1,a[3]) s:SetSpellCardDifficulty(i-1,a[4]) s:SetSpellCardColor(i-1,a[5][1],a[5][2],a[5][3],a[5][4]) end end end end
